Title: Juicy Couture “Rare” Double Wrap Padlock Charm Watch MOP Dial Leather Band
Description: SEE AUCTION SALE NOTE BELOW-PAYMENT DUE WITHIN THREE (3) DAYS AFTER END OF AUCTION UNLESS BUY-IT-NOW! Description FABULOUS RARE 2006 JUICY COUTURE TIMEPIECE-WOMEN’S DOUBLE WRAP PADLOCK CHARM WATCH MOTHER-OF-PEARL DIAL WITH HANGING SILVER CROWN KEY PRE-OWNED TIMEPIECE NEW BATTERY-RUNNING AND KEEPING TIME PLEASE BE AWARE THAT A NEW BATTERY OR BATTERIES WAS PLACED IN THE WATCH TO CHECK ITS WORKABILITY AND ACCURACY. FROM THE TIME THE ITEM IS LISTED, AND WHEN YOU RECEIVE THE WATCH, IT MAY OR MAY NOT NEED TO BE REPLACED. PLEASE KEEP THIS IN MIND WHEN PURCHASING. YOU MAY HAVE TO REPLACE THE BATTERY AFTER A TIME UPON RECEIPT OF THE WATCH, LIKE ANY QUARTZ TIMEPIECE. This is truly a wonderful and rare Juicy Couture double wrap Padlock Charm watch! This watch originally sold for $450.00 when issued in 2006. The realistic looking brown leather wrapped padlock has a rectangular shape timepiece on the end. The watch dial is mother-of-pearl, with Juicy’s Crown representing 12 o’clock, and other Roman Numeral hour markers. The silver stylized watch hands depict the “J” and “C” on their ends. The watch is attached to a stainless bar. In addition, the padlock’s key is attached with the Juicy crown on the end. The watch is attached to a brown leather band that wraps twice around the wrist. The band has a buckle style closure. When listed, a new battery was placed in the watch and is running and working properly. This watch and unique band really stands out when worn. IF YOU HAVE A PROBLEM WITH THE PURCHASE, OR ANY QUESTIONS ABOUT THIS ITEM, PLEASE CONTACT ME FIRST. THIS SELLER IS VERY ACCOMMODATING AND WILL ASSIST YOU AND ACCEPT RETURNS NO QUESTIONS ASKED.
